name: Overcoming Pain
description: Do you like weapons and ammunition? Do you like action? Do you like adrenaline in the blood and crowds of enemies?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 + Processor: Intel Core i3 + Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 + Processor: Intel Core i5 + Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 + DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
